name: Crazy Drive
description:
Non - Comercial Use

Part of Unity education at PISMO Novska Croatia

Crazy Drive is my first project in Unity after one month of education at Simora PISMO Inkubator in Novska. Goal was to create a game with all the knowledge that we have achieved over the first month of education, simple score, movement and health/lives systems.

Game description: 

Rules are simple: drive your car on busy highway and try to gain as much score as you can before you die.
